
# About the Author {-}

Davis Vaughan is a lover of all things R and Finance. He is graduating with a Master's
in Quantitative Finance in May 2018, with immediate plans to work in the 
fixed income financial industry. He is the co-author of several packages hosted
under the [Business Science](http://www.business-science.io/) name including
__tidyquant__, __tibbletime__, and __timetk__.
